properties.entry: select a.docId instance_id, j.judgement_id, doc.documentSet = 'train' train, d.disease_id from i2b2_2008_anno a inner join i2b2_2008_disease d on d.disease = a.disease inner join i2b2_2008_doc doc on doc.docId = a.docId inner join i2b2_2008_judgement j on j.judgement = a.judgement inner join i2b2_best_libsvm l on l.label = d.disease_id and l.experiment = 'bocuis' left join hotspot_zero_vector hzv on hzv.instance_id = a.docId and hzv.label = a.disease and hzv.cutoff = l.cutoff and hzv.name = 'i2b2.2008-cui' where hzv.hotspot_zero_vector_id is null and a.source = 'intuitive'

select s.*, 1 from ( select h.instance_id, h.feature_name from hotspot_feature_eval h inner join i2b2_2008_disease d on d.disease = h.label inner join i2b2_best_libsvm l on l.label = d.disease_id and l.experiment = 'bocuis' where d.disease_id = :label and name = 'i2b2.2008-cui' and h.evaluation >= l.cutoff ) s
